resources.string:
Movement was never easier! Just draw a line or click on a field where you want to move to. You can also use the trackball, WASD keys or the D-PAD to move a single step up, left, down or right

Finish a level by moving all objects onto their targets

Use the yellow arrow on the toolbar to undo, the red to reset a level

To zoom use the glasses icon on the toolbar

This game was developed and published by leihwelt.com

Idea, Code and Graphics - Marcus Körner

For support or other questions please mail to leihweltsupport@gmail.com

Have a look at www.leihwelt.com
